summary.para: When this interface will be implemented, the following rules must be adhered.
- The implementation has only a constructor which has no arguments.
- All of the implemented operations are pure.
- If the implementation does not support the operation, the method throws immediately for any arguments.
- If the operation will fail for the input arguments, the method throws (including ).
- If is nullable and some arguments are null, the method can throw (not must).
